| Leaders                 = Formed and controlled by [[Samuel Barone (Earth-616)|Black Talon]]

| Origin                  = Using Voodoo, [[Black Talon]] resurrected deceased [[Homo Superior|mutant]]s as [[Zombies]] to fight [[Jennifer Walters (Earth-616)|She-Hulk]].
| PlaceOfFormation        = An unnamed swamp in [[Louisiana (State)|Louisiana]]
| PlaceOfDissolution      = A road in Louisiana
| Creators                = John Byrne; Keith Williams
| First                   = Sensational She-Hulk #34
| Last                    = Sensational She-Hulk #35

| HistoryText             = [[Samuel Barone (Earth-616)|Black Talon]] brought four [[Homo Superior|mutants]] back to life:
* [[Harold Leland (Earth-616)|Harry Leland]]: Former [[Hellfire Club (Earth-616)|Hellfire Club]] [[Black Bishop]] who suffered a heart attack when fighting [[Nimrod (Earth-811)|Nimrod]].
* [[Scaleface (Earth-616)|Scaleface]]: A [[Morlocks (Earth-616)|Morlock]] who escaped the [[Mutant Massacre]] only to be killed by the police.
* [[Jack Winters (Earth-616)|Living Diamond]]: A criminal and early [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] foe who was shattered into many pieces.
* [[Kevin Sidney (Earth-616)|Changeling]]: X-Men foe who reformed when near death and masqueraded as [[Charles Xavier (Earth-616)|Professor X]] to save him from an [[alien]] attack.

While the other members attacked [[Jennifer Walters (Earth-616)|She-Hulk]], Changeling fought against Black Talon's control and tried to free She-Hulk's friend, [[Blonde Phantom|Louise Mason]]. She-Hulk thought he was trying to harm her friend, and attacked.

When She-Hulk became distracted, Talon and the X-Humed escaped in a hearse. Still rebelling, Changeling morphed into Elvis Presley to attract the attention of passing police officers. She-Hulk was able to catch up to the hearse and crash it, but was confused about Changeling's actions. He explained Talon couldn't control the four zombies completely at the same time and he was able to try and stop him; he had died a hero and wasn't about to change.

The four were given proper burials, their mouths filled with salt and sewn shut to prevent them from rising as zombies again.{{r|Sensational She-Hulk #34|35}}

| Equipment               =
